com.innolabs.spydroid

Class LocationsListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.innolabs.spydroid.LocationsListener

  • public class LocationsListener
extends Service
    Location Listener is a class used to listen or track the locations of the user and storing them to the database
    Author:
    Srikanth Rao
    See Also:
    Service

      • onBind

        public IBinder onBind(Intent intent)
        Method called when BindService is called from other instance
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        null Noting is sent back to the bindService method
        See Also:

      • onStartCommand

        public int onStartCommand(Intent intent,
                 int flags,
                 int startId)
        Method that starts as soon as the Location Listener service is started. This method is used to log or spy or track the location details from the device and save them to a database.
        Returns:
        The Intent, Flags and startId which was sent as arguments
        See Also:
        Service

      • getLocation

        private void getLocation(Context context)
        Get location method used to get the location details of the user or the device
        Parameters:
        context - The context from which the location details was requested

      • getTableValues

        private String getTableValues()
        Get table values is a generic method used to add the column name values to the table name.
        Returns:
        table values i.e column names and its properties
